title: Board player badges
body: Are y'all thinking of re-implementing badges back into the boards for players who have been playing for multiple seasons?? Also are badges for post amounts coming back? I'm genuinely curious, and I'd love to get a definitive answer. If not, what's holding you back from bring them here again?

replies.body: Hey Garebear MAULS, it's a current limitation we are aware of. We'd like to tackle it as some point and it's on our list.

we need the badges,  back here or in the league client pref both. We are about to be in the 5 season and i  plan on playing for many more seasons after the next one but there is no place to look up what rank you achieved in the preveious seasons.
